name: Twitter Dark Lume (3-in-1)
description: TWITTER DARK LUME IS NOW A STANDALONE CHROME ADDON! IF YOU WANT TO INSTALL THE ADDON VERSION VISIT THIS LINK: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/twitter-lume-reskin/khaeenckjiflnchbnejmackcgomcbnmk?hl=en&authuser=0 Guide Twitter thread Features: --3 color themes you can choose from (Light, Dim, and Lights out) through regular color theme picker of Twitter (Display->Background); --Hide promotional tweets; --Expand Images If you 🧡this, check out my other script for Twitter,i Gif & Video Downloader
additional_info:
07.08.2020 Fixes for the new Twitter update
12.06.2020 Various fixes
04.06.2020 Fixed icon labels appearing over icons on FF
03.06.2020 Some fixes for Arabic languages
02.06.2020 Added option to hide "What's happening?" box
30.05.2020 Added background options and custom font 
29.05.2020 Fixed tweet caps
29.05.2020 Fixed bug that caused timeline to shift
29.05.2020 Added expand images option
29.05.2020 Added preset color schemes for themes 1&2
